section.heading: Report on greenhouse gas emissions in District procurement.

para.text: By January 1, 2023, the Department of Energy and Environment shall publish a report on its website with recommendations for how to reduce greenhouse gas emissions associated with goods and services procured by the District, including:
A comprehensive list of what goods and services can be tracked and reduced using life cycle analysis data; and
Best practices for reducing greenhouse gas emissions associated with procurement of such goods and services.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-16: § 4 of D.C. Law 24-16 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(a) of D.C. Law 24-16 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
